meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #272.

td.p: April Zwick, an attorney originally from St. Petersburg, Florida
Rob Lai, an insurance investigator from Los Angeles, California
Joe Alley, a student originally from Huntsville, Alabama (whose 2-day cash winnings total $9,199)

tr.td: "FOR" WORDS
RELIGION
MAGAZINES
NUMBER PLEASE
THE HUMAN BODY
FAMOUS DUCKS
